name: Olympics 2020: The Virus Run
description:
P.S. Controls are W and D

The game is kinda long play it on full screen but when the game is over get back to the normal screen so you can click the main menu or play again.
This is my first game jam and my first game too.
This might not be the nicest game out there but its my first game so I cant complain xD .. 
This game was supposed to be on android but Im still not be able to upload this to play store thats why we just did it for pc .. but maybe in the future when we remastered this xD.

FEEL FREE TO COMMENT DOWN SOME FEEDBACKS and TIPS

Special thanks to my team / friends :
NamatoShi
RaevnSight

If its broken to the browser you can download the game here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TEXsdFxHaIsoU35XLcHzx8rMH6QM0FUO/view?usp=shari...
